gui.forgotten.incompatibility.message.ir: Iris changes how Minecraft renders certain things, and most importantly, it does not allow the use of CORE/VANILLA type shaders, which breaks the visual effects of Forgotten. If you really want to play Forgotten with shaders, you will need to create a MIXIN to the ForgottenClient class to remove this alert. I don’t provide the option here because people tend not to read these messages and then complain that the mod doesn’t work.
